titles.title: Worker Meal Fairness Act of 1998

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that meals furnished to all employees at a place of business shall be excludable from gross income if most employees at such place of business are furnished meals for the convenience of the employer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/12/1998--Introduced. Worker Meal Fairness Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the exclusion from an employee's income of meals furnished to such employee by an employer on the business premises of the employer only if more than one-half of the employees to whom such meals are furnished on such premises are furnished meals for the convenience of the employer.
